sentence.Network_en: Do what you can to give her confidence and boost her morale.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽你所能让她树立信心，提高士气。

sentence.Network_en: It was amazing what a morale booster her visits proved.
sentence.Network_cn: 令人惊诧的是，她的访问大大鼓舞了士气。

sentence.Network_en: His generous offer was a tremendous tonic for our morale.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的慷慨相助对我们的士气是种极大的激励。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from French moral, respelled to preserve the final stress in pronunciation

entry.def: Morale is the amount of confidence and cheerfulness that a group of people have.

example.ex: Many pilots are suffering from low morale...
example.tran: 很多飞行员目前士气低落。

example.ex: They hope to boost the morale of their troops.
example.tran: 他们希望提升部队的士气。

means.word_mean: 1. a state of individual psychological well-being based upon a sense of confidence and usefulness and purpose
2. the spirit of a group that makes the members want the group to succeed

auth_sentence.content: Their morale seesawed with a series of unlikely discoveries.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their morale seesawed with a series of unlikely discoveries.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their morale seesawed with a series of unlikely discoveries.

auth_sentence.content: She gave me a...majestic half-smile. It boosted my morale.
auth_sentence.res_content: She gave me a...majestic half-smile. It boosted my morale.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She gave me a...majestic half-smile. It boosted my morale.

auth_sentence.content: The morale among the fighters in Douma was high.
auth_sentence.res_content: The morale among the fighters in Douma was high.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The morale among the fighters in Douma was high.

stems_affixes.word_buile: non非+moral[adj.道德[上]的,精神上的 n.寓意,教育意义]→adj.与道德无关的
mor道德+al……的→adj.道德[上]的,精神上的 n.寓意,教育意义
mor道德+es表示复数→n.风俗习惯,道德观念
mor道德+al……的→adj.道德[上]的,精神上的 n.寓意,教育意义
mor道德+ale→[一群人]有道德精神→士气

stems_affixes.value_cn: 从道德上解释, 教化
stems_affixes.word_buile: moral[adj.道德[上]的,精神上的 n.寓意,教育意义]+ize表动词→v.从道德上解释, 教化 v.说教, 论道德

sentences.en: The morale of the enemy troops is sinking lower every day.

jushi.english: The past 15 months have destroyed morale.
Our firm's morale has reached new low.
jushi.chinese: 我们公司的士气已下降到了新低点。
